definition.definition: A definition of the conducted experiment.

paradigm.definition: The experimental paradigm e.g. Two-alternative-forced-choice, Three-alternative-forced-choice.

subject_instruction.definition: The instructions given to the subjects.

task.definition: The task the subjects have to do like "discrimination" between different stimuli, "detection" of a stimulus etc...

training_trials.definition: The number of trials used for training of the experimental subject.
